revised_title: Anatomy and Classification of Heterophyllia, Battersbyia, Palaeocyclus, and Asterosmilia Species
tldr: The author examines the anatomy and classification of four genera of sclerodermic zoantharia, including Heterophyllia, Battersbyia, Palaeocyclus, and Asterosmilia, and reclassifies Palaeocyclus into the Cyathophyllidae family based on their unique anatomical features and characteristics.
